.. _singularity_sif_header:

singularity sif header
----------------------

Display global header

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~


Display global header from a SIF image.

::

  singularity sif header <sif_path>

Examples
~~~~~~~~

::

  sif header image.sif

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help   help for header

SEE ALSO
~~~~~~~~

* :ref:`singularity sif <singularity_sif>` 	 - Manipulate Singularity Image Format (SIF) images
